subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The torch relay for the Beijing Olympics reached the Acropolis in Athens amid heavy police security and brief demonstrations by small groups of protesters. The police briefly scuffled with antiglobalization demonstrators shortly after the relay entered the city. At the foot of the Acropolis, another group unfurled a banner reading Free Tibet. Neither protest disrupted the relay, and no arrests were reported.
